rows.label: tev027002_MSG0001
rows.name: I demand an explanation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0002
rows.name: Er, could friend be more specific?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0003
rows.name:
Grrrr! You know what? Forget the explanation.
I just want you to own up to what you've done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0004
rows.name: Chiroro still not follow what friend getting at.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0005
rows.name: Arrrgh! I can't take any more of this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0006
rows.name: Hey! You there! You're a BLADE, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0007
rows.name:
You look like you've got a knack for xeno diplomacy.
Would you give this Nopon here a good talking-to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0008
rows.name:
The customer is always right, so I demand an apology.
...AND compensation for my emotional distress![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0009
rows.name: But Chiroro already say sorry to friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0010
rows.name:
You didn't mean a word of it. Plus, you still haven't
paid up. And I'm not talking to you anyway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0011
rows.name:
First, I need this [ST:gender p1=gentleman p2=fine lady ] here to understand what I've
been through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0012
rows.name:
Although you can probably guess what happened to
me, can't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's my hair! Or what USED to be my hair!
I mean, just LOOK at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'd love to say I'm starting a punk career or trying to
hide from a crazy boyfriend, but I'm not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0015
rows.name:
This Nopon sold me a shiny-smooth skin lotion that
was supposed to take out all my wrinkles. But it turned
out to be a buzz saw for my hair![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0016
rows.name:
But friend look quite lovely without tuft.
No wrinkle in sight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0017
rows.name:
My hair wasn't a "tuft"! And I look like I just ran off
to join a monastery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0018
rows.name:
But now your head like baby bottom!
Earth friends all love babies. Very cute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0019
rows.name: Less talking, more compensation paying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0020
rows.name:
The lotion was five credits, but when you factor in my
emotional distress, mental suffering, and potential lost
business, I think 10,000 credits is more than fair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0021
rows.name: MEH-MEH-MEH-MEEEEEEEEEH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0022
rows.name:
This extortion! Chiroro never get paws on that
much money![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0023
rows.name: Crazy friend want enough cash to buy small planetoid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, knock if off already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0025
rows.name: Chiroro never be able to pay that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0026
rows.name:
Then you had better get out there and find me a
medicine that grows my hair back. ...Or else![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0027
rows.name: B-but...there not even guarantee such medicine exist![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0028
rows.name:
I don't care if you find it or engineer it yourself.
Just make it happen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0029
rows.name:
Waaah! So scary! Chiroro want Mamapon!
...You there. BLADE friend. Help Chiroro![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0030
rows.name: Hey! This is my BLADE! Get your own![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_JNK0010
rows.name: Reimburse

rows.label: tev027002_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to pay the damages.

rows.label: tev027002_JNK0020
rows.name: Search

rows.label: tev027002_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer to look for some kind of hair-regrowth medicine.

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0031
rows.name:
Whoa, really? Friend will pay 10,000 credits on behalf
of Chiroro?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0032
rows.name: Hey! Don't let that pom-pom use you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0033
rows.name:
If this Nopon wants to pretend to be a reputable
merchant, then she needs to learn there are
consequences for her actions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0034
rows.name: On Earth, we have this thing called "ethics."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0035
rows.name:
Huh? Friend will go find puffy-hair supercream for
Chiroro? Friend thinks puffy-hair supercream
really exist?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0036
rows.name:
Hope friend doesn't mind that Chiroro think up
cool name in advance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0037
rows.name: Hey! Don't let that pom-pom use you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0038
rows.name:
If this Nopon wants to pretend to be a reputable
merchant, then she needs to learn there are
consequences for her actions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0039
rows.name: On Earth, we have this thing called "ethics."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0040
rows.name:
Now stop taking advantage of people and either
cough up the cash or serve up the medicineâ€”
on your own![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0041
rows.name: Time to step up your game, peddle-puff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0042
rows.name: Chiroro need pillow to cry in...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0043
rows.name: Cut the act and get those feet in gear! Chop-chop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027002_MSG0044
rows.name: Y-yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]
